page.title: 02INDUSTRY
page.content: I.C.I. resulted in 1946 from plastic demand,excellent site,communications, coal and skills.Production of petro chemicals exceeds two million tonnes ,60% minimally exported mostly to Europe,America and the Far East. Efficiency helped weather recession but the approx 6,250 work force-95% male-is falling,without compulsory redundancy.Skilled female employees increase and skill is increasingly essential,though unskilled are employed I.C.I. gives to charity and education and further links are sought Interviewees,mostly male, middle-aged, White collar,working 37.5 hours/week seemed happy with I.C.I,which provides profit sharing and good facilities. Pollution and other hazards are controlled and neat plant is separated from habitation.Projection is difficult because of oversea markets
